entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Enable cancellation of navigation events #42877
    7.0-rc1
  • SignalR guaranteed message delivery #42874
  • dotnet.timezones.blat & dotnet.timezones.blat.gz do not have the same contents on Publish #42873
  • Changing CSS in RCL forces app restart when using BlazorWebView #42871
  • blazor: using open/close region vs passing int sequence numbers to component creator method #42870
  • Incorporate version numbers into Blazor _framework / _content filenames to force browser resource load #42869

Closed

  • Using C# in the Internet browser from an ASP.NET MVC application #42875
    Discussions
  • What will happen if C# p/invokes a C++ WASM module that starts a WebWorker and then calls back to C# callback? #42851
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing failed to build with error MSB4186 #42772
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Microsoft Default Blazor WASM app not launched in Https configuration #42745
  • Issue running .net6.0 (arm64) under IIS on Windows 11 ARM64 - missing version '6.0.o' (arm64) #42699
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Fix active Component Governance bugs #37889
    7.0-preview3
  • Cannot bind StringValues for optional HTTP request header with Minimal APIs #40752
    7.0-rc1
  • Expose location changing event for NavigationManger #14962
    7.0-rc1
  • Faster creating query string in 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Extensions.QueryBuilder' #42810
  • Problem Restoring NuGet Packages #42868
  • No default value for missing Enumerable QueryParameter #42320
    .NET 7 Planning
  • ASP.Net Hosting Bundle Installer Has Issues In Some Situations #42764
    7.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Split Blazor WASM Auth Tests to New Project #42879
    area-mvc, 7.0-rc1
  • Fix the code to ignore parameters from incorrect locations #42878
    area-web-frameworks
  • Fix UsePathBase with WAB #42876
    area-runtime
  • Add Description to OpenApiResponseBody #42872
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Updating _AddContentRootForProjectReferences target #42863
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Allow binding to StringValues? with Minimal APIs #41789
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Allow cancellation of navigation events in Blazor #42638
    area-blazor, 7.0-rc1
  • Issue #42810 : Changes `StringBuilder` to `ValueStringBuilder` in QueryBuilder.cs #42867
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-rc1
  • Allow Collection Default Value binding #42824
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Add logging to QUIC tests and disable parallel execution #42853
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Log a warning when using an untrusted developer certificate #42621
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • [Migrated] - Generate Composite Images Redistributable #42506
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove RequestDelegateFactory call from RouteEndpointBuilder #42827
    area-runtime
  • Task and ValueTask are not covariant #41719
    area-runtime
  • Adding a new Http3Cat project to ease testing #42861
    area-runtime
  • [Blazor] Dynamic authentication requests #42692
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm-auth
  • Update templates to incorporate net7 changes #42802
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 7.0-rc1
  • Route tooling #42597
    area-web-frameworks
